title: Keweenaw National Historical Park: Our Staff & Offices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices        Constructed of brick, waste mine rock and granite, the former general office building for the Calumet & Hecla Company now serves as the headquarters for Keweenaw National Historical Park.  NPS Photo       Our offices are located at 25970 Red Jacket Road, just off U.S. Highway 41 in Calumet, Michigan.   Please call or email us for general inquiries or to contact any of the park staff directly.
